pullRequest.title: cluescrolls: Add X Marks The Spot quest solutions
pullRequest.bodyText: This mostly speaks for itself. itemComposition != null is removed from the plugin as it is vestigial--it will never be false.

beforeCommit.message: cluescrolls: Add X Marks The Spot quest solutions

afterCommit.message: cluescrolls: Add X Marks The Spot quest solutions

nodes.bodyText: You should verify the menu type before assuming the id is an item id. I think the old code works because you can getItemComposition() with any id and it always returns a non null item with the name "null" if the id isn't valid. However this is bad practice and we should prefer to remove that whenever we see it.
